title: Warriors Struggle, Mavs Catch Fire
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk the Warriors struggles of late, Steph’s shooting slump, the importance of Draymond Green and Luka’s white hot play to lead the streaking Mavs. Plus, the return of MacMahon’s segment.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Warriors Struggle, Mavs Get Hot, A Banned Segment Returns
